name: 3 Minutes (MagicChickenStudios)
description:
3 Minutes is a very short horror-puzzle game where you have 3 minutes to escape a small room. This game was made in 3 hours so it is not extremely polished or long; it's just for fun :)

Features:

  • A room with clues
  • A locked door
  • Mysterious VHS tape
  • Spoooookkkyyyyy
  • A twist at the end

Hope you enjoy, let us know if you have any questions!

(There aren’t many screenshots because you can only get so many angles on a small room)
